amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the Secretary of the Interior from moving any aspect of the Solid Minerals program administered by the Bureau of Land Management (BLM) to the Office of Surface Mining, Reclamation and Enforcement (OSM).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 112-540 to prohibit the Secretary of the Interior from moving any aspect of the Solid Minerals program administered by the Bureau of Land Management (BLM) to the Office of Surface Mining, Reclamation and Enforcement (OSM).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Amodei amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 257 - 162 (Roll no. 399).
